articles.title: Inter-Korean Economic Meeting Held
North Side's Delegation Back from Seoul
articles.content:
North Side's Delegation Back from Seoul 
   Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the north side led by Vice-Premier of the Cabinet Jon Sung Hun flew back here Thursday after participating in the first meeting of the inter-Korean committee for economic cooperation held in Seoul.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Zambian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Zambian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, met and had a talk with Lupando A. F. K. Mwape, new Zambian ambassador to the DPRK, on Friday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Secretary General of International Kim Il Sung Foundation Here
articles.content:
Secretary General of International Kim Il Sung Foundation Here 
   Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Keith Bennett, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, and his party arrived here on December 6.
